dcterms:description: CULane has 55 hours of video clips and consists of nine road conditions: normal, crowd, curve, dazzle night, night, no line, and arrow. It contains 133235 frames of size 590 Ã— 1640, with a maximum of 4 lanes per frame.
dcterms:title: CULane

dcterms:description: TuSimple is a relatively small dataset with 6408 frames, all shot under stable light conditions on highways. It contains a maximum of 5 lanes per frame.
dcterms:title: TuSimple

dcterms:creator: F. Yu
H. Chen

W. Xian
Y. Chen

V. Madhavan
T. Darrell
dcterms:description: BDD100K is designed for lane classification with binary annotation for lane semantics. It includes 80000 training frames and 10000 validation frames, with lanes close to each other and in different forms.
dcterms:title: BDD100K
